[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [WidgetDiv](./blockly.widgetdiv_namespace.md) &gt; [show](./blockly.widgetdiv_namespace.show_1_function.md)

## WidgetDiv.show() function

Initialize and display the widget div. Close the old one if needed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function show(newOwner: unknown, rtl: boolean, newDispose: () => void, workspace?: WorkspaceSvg | null, manageEphemeralFocus?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newOwner | unknown | The object that will be using this container. |
|  rtl | boolean | Right-to-left (true) or left-to-right (false). |
|  newDispose | () =&gt; void | Optional cleanup function to be run when the widget is closed. |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) \| null | _(Optional)_ The workspace associated with the widget owner. |
|  manageEphemeralFocus | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether ephemeral focus should be managed according to the widget div's lifetime. Note that if a false value is passed in here then callers should manage ephemeral focus directly otherwise focus may not properly restore when the widget closes. Defaults to true. |

**Returns:**

void
